bioconda.name: bioconductor-keggorthology
bioconda.summary: graph support for KO, KEGG Orthology

biotools.summary: Graphical representation of the Feb 2010 KEGG Orthology. The KEGG orthology is a set of pathway IDs that are not to be confused with the KEGG ortholog IDs.

bioschemas.name: keggorthology
bioschemas.summary: Graphical representation of the Feb 2010 KEGG Orthology. The KEGG orthology is a set of pathway IDs that are not to be confused with the KEGG ortholog IDs.
